replies.body: If that's the case I hope Fizz, Riven, Darius, Zed and Rengar die to, cause those fuckers are broken as shit.
Neither of those champions are broken. Most of them require a high skill cap, except for Fizz, Darius, Zed and Rengar (jk).

> [{quoted}](name=Truegolddigger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jVaBqxKu,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-08-01T23:08:52.131+0000)
>
> Neither of those champions are broken. Most of them require a high skill cap, except for Fizz, Darius, Zed and Rengar (jk).

Yes because every idiot who just plays zed isn't actually lucky every few games, rengar is very technical and delicate with how you use your abilities (because now you have to think of 4 with empowered rather then the combo of 3), Fizz is stupid and I don't play against him enough to identify weakness or skillcap, Same with daruis

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jVaBqxKu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-01T07:01:33.906+0000)
>
> Riven.



What happens to my RP? :(
He shall come back surrounded by a wooden box. And the smell of barbecue.

he shall come back with a legendary skin
